settings.name: Reference time
settings.description: Select a reference time towards which your data are evaluated. Default is NOW.

settings.name: Voltage variable name
settings.description: Provide the exact name of the variable in your data describing tag voltage. If unsure, please run the first App in your workflow and check the Variable Names in the Output Details overview.

settings.name: Migration buffer - Km (last 7 days)
settings.description: Define the radius (in Km) an animal must move past to qualify as migration behaviour.

settings.name: Mortality buffer - m (last 7 days)
settings.description: Define the radius (in m) within which an animal must remain to indicate a likely mortality.
